CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://www.getfeedback.com/r/Q1OKv20A?&gf_q[8029785][16020180]=" + FirstName + "&gf_q[8029785][16144778]=" + LastName + "&gf_q[8029785][16020181]="+Title+"&gf_q[8029785][16020184]=" + MailingPostalCode+"&gf_q[8029785][16020182]=" + Phone+"&gf_q[8029785][16020183]="+ Email + "&gf_q[8029785][17755759]="+MailingState+"&ContactID="+Id +"&AccountID=" + AccountId, "Start Roofing NPS Survey")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Launch GetFeedback NPS Survey for Contact
CustomField.label: Roofing NPS Survey
